mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Senator John Davison (Jay) Rockefeller IV Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Your Legacy Fighting Inequality and Excess Memorandum
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Your Legacy Fighting Inequality and Excess Memorandum" is an overview of Senator John D. (Jay) Rockefeller's work in the areas of corporate accountability, and tax, minimum wage, and unemployment benefit reform. It also deals with the Freedom Industries Chemical Spill on the Elk River in Charleston, WV, in 2014.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rockefeller, John D, IV (John Davison), 1937
